jobs.title: Frontend React Developer (Mid-Level)
jobs.description: Building amazing user interfaces with React and Tailwind CSS. We are seeking a motivated developer with 3-5 years of experience to join our core team. The ideal candidate will focus on performance optimization and scalable UI architecture.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer with a minimum of 5 years of industry experience, preferably working in the financial IT community. The position in the team is focused on delivering exceptional services to minimize/avoid any production outages. The role will focus on production support.

jobs.title: Graphic Design Intern
jobs.description: Join our creative team to assist in designing marketing materials, website layouts, and social media graphics. This role is perfect for a student or recent graduate looking to gain hands-on experience in a fast-paced agency environment.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
jobs.description: Analyzing complex datasets to extract meaningful insights and build predictive models. Proficiency in Python and machine learning frameworks is essential. This is a senior role requiring independent research and problem-solving skills.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.description: Managing end-to-end logistics projects, ensuring timely delivery and budget adherence. We need a highly organized individual who can coordinate cross-functional teams and handle client communications effectively.
